Cart Views¶

apps.cart.views.cart_detail(request)¶

Renders the cart page, getting a list of ordered products to render them Return:

-[Render] Renders the cart.html

apps.cart.views.success(request)¶

Cleans the cart if the order has finished Return:

-[Render] Renders the success.html

ClickAway
